channel.title: Textual Data on Michal Kapusta
channel.description: Recent content in Textual Data on Michal Kapusta

item.title: What can hotel landlords learn from the guest reviews? Use case from booking.com dataset
item.author: michal.kapusta@gmail.com (Michal Kapusta)
item.description: Background Information In this article, I will analyze textual data from hotel reviews. This analysis will focus on real estate investors or landlords since guest reviews offer insight into hotel performace.
